Test passes if the #dingbats_segoe_ui_semilight block uses the Segoe UI Semilight font instead of the Arial font to display a .notdef tofu block.
❘
#dingbats_segoe_ui_semilight:
"Segoe UI Symbol" : 1

✀✁✂✃✄✅✆✇✈✉✊✋✌✍✎✏✐✑✒✓✔✕✖✗✘✙✚✛✜✝✞✟✠✡✢✣✤✥✦✧✨✩✪✫✬✭✮✯✰✱✲✳✴✵✶✷✸✹✺✻✼✽✾✿❀❁❂❃❄❅❆❇❈❉❊❋❌❍❎❏❐❑❒❓❔❕❖❗❘❙❚❛❜❝❞❟❠❡❢❣❤❥❦❧❨❩❪❫❬❭❮❯❰❱❲❳❴❵❶❷❸❹❺❻❼❽❾❿➀➁➂➃➄➅➆➇➈➉➊➋➌➍➎➏➐➑➒➓➔➕➖➗➘➙➚➛➜➝➞➟➠➡➢➣➤➥➦➧➨➩➪➫➬➭➮➯➰➱➲➳➴➵➶➷➸➹➺➻➼➽➾➿
#dingbats_unicode_block:
"Segoe UI Symbol" : 175,
"Segoe UI Emoji" : 17

FAIL
